definition: emptiness/void/abstract theory or guiding principles/empty or unoccupied/diffident or timid/false/humble or modest/(of health) weak/virtual/in vain

sentences.english: And he was still lying about his age, just a little bit.
sentences.chinese: 他現在也虛報了年齡，說小了那麼一點點。

sentences.english: Where can I watch Lowball movie online free full stream?
sentences.chinese: 我在哪裏可以免費看電影在線虛報低價全流？

sentences.english: The salesman padded the bill for his travelling expenses by exaggerating his food expenses.
sentences.chinese: 推銷員誇大伙食費的開支來虛報出差費。

sentences.english: Participants in the high-power group considered the misreporting of travel expenses to be a significantly worse offense.
sentences.chinese: 高權力組成員認爲虛報差旅費是一種相當嚴重的過錯。

sentences.english: We found that the report was false.
sentences.chinese: 我們問明後知道是虛報。

sentences.english: To be sure, fake or credentials aren't unique to China.
sentences.chinese: 當然，假文憑或虛報學歷的情形並非中國獨佔。

sentences.english: Within China's domestic sports scene there has been age-fixing as well.
sentences.chinese: 在中國國內的體育競技現場也存在虛報年齡的問題。

sentences.english: To be sure, fake or unearned education credentials aren't  unique to China.
sentences.chinese: 當然，假文憑或虛報學歷的情況並非中國獨有。

sentences.english: It is dishonest to lie about ones age.
Company officials deny that ITS misrepresented itself.
sentences.chinese: 中介公司負責人否認ITS虛報。

sentences.english: Some could even inflate the value of their stocks to land fatter loans.
sentences.chinese: 有些甚至可以虛報其庫存價值，獲取更多貸款。

sentences.english: They found out the puffed-up purchase orders.
sentences.chinese: 他們發現這些報銷單數字都被虛報了。

sentences.english: A similar technique is the Low-Ball approach.
sentences.chinese: 一個相似的技巧是虛報低價法。

sentences.english: I hear your brother faked his age and joined the army.
sentences.chinese: 我聽說你弟弟虛報年齡，參了軍。

sentences.english: Women often lie about their age.
